item.title: CVE-2017-1002152|2024-09-16T20:27:46.322Z -- fedora%20project%20infrastructure -- bodhi
item.description: Bodhi 2.9.0 and lower is vulnerable to cross-site scripting resulting in code injection caused by incorrect validation of bug titles.
